scripts.build-node-modules: rm -R node_modules ; docker run --rm -v `pwd`:/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs10.x npm install
scripts.test-file: docker run --rm -e S3_BUCKET=hmn-uploads-eu -e S3_REGION=eu-west-1 -v `pwd`:/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs10.x lambda-handler.handler '{"path":"/'$npm_config_path'", "headers":{}}'
scripts.build-zip: rm lambda.zip; zip -r --exclude='node_modules/aws-sdk/*' --exclude='node_modules/animated-gif-detector/test/*' lambda.zip ./node_modules/ index.js proxy-file.js lambda-handler.js
scripts.build-zip-edge-origin-request: rm tachyon-origin-request-lambda_*.zip; zip -r --exclude='node_modules/aws-sdk/*' --exclude='node_modules/animated-gif-detector/test/*' tachyon-origin-request-lambda_$(date +%s).zip ./node_modules/ lambda@edge/lib.js lambda@edge/origin-request-handler.js
scripts.build-zip-edge-origin-response: rm tachyon-origin-response-lambda_*.zip; zip -r --exclude='node_modules/aws-sdk/*' --exclude='node_modules/animated-gif-detector/test/*' tachyon-origin-response-lambda_$(date +%s).zip ./node_modules/ index.js lambda@edge/lib.js lambda@edge/origin-response-handler.js
